text: Madang Football Club was a Papua New Guinean professional soccer club based in Madang. It played in the Papua New Guinea National Soccer League (PNGNSL). The club was founded in 2006 and was one of the five founding members of the PNGNSL. In 2019, the club folded and merged with the Tusbab Stallions. Although it never won the PNGNSL, it finished second twice. ==References== Category:2006 establishments in Oceania Category:Soccer clubs in Papua New Guinea
title: Madang F.C.
